data.name: Squids Odyssey- Official Game Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Squids Odyssey Original Game Soundtrack by Romain Gauthier
The complete music collection from Squids Odyssey, plus previously unreleased tracks related to the digital comic "Squids - The Edge of the Sea", the canceled animated series, unused bits, sketches, and more.

46 tracks, more than 80 minutes of music. Available in MP3.
You’ll find the files in you Steam directory upon purchase: ...Steam\steamapps\common\SquidsOdyssey\Soundtrack

Track list :
1. Squids Launch Trailer 01:12
2. The Beginning 01:17
3. The Casual Adventure 04:20
4. Turtle Carnage 04:27
5. Mollusc Warfare 03:59
6. Thalas The Great 03:19
7. All Is Well 01:55
8. Squids Theme 03:13
9. A New Chapter 00:12
10. The Wet West 01:29
11. The Bigger Adventure 05:13
12. Calamari Cavalry 02:12
13. Seawood 02:45
14. Tales of the Ocean 00:59
15. The Wild Hunch 03:30
16. What It's About 02:00
17. Pale Hunter 02:38
18. Unpleasant Encounter 00:24
19. Baron 01:21
20. Spirit of the West 01:22
21. Bitter 00:10
22. Return to Thalas 06:16
23. Wakame no Sensō 01:32
24. Wakame Battle 05:11
25. You Plain Fools 00:32
26. The Lost and the Damned 04:49
27. Fade to Black 01:24
28. Squids Theme - Wild West 02:46

29. JINGLE - Victory 00:10
30. JINGLE - Defeat 00:07
31. BONUS - Halloween Special Mission 04:04
32. BONUS - The Edge of the Sea (digital comic) 01:00
33. BONUS - WiiU channel loops 01:44
34. BONUS - TV Series - Previously On Squids 01:30
35. BONUS - TV Series - Saloon 00:34
36. BONUS - TV Series - End Credits 00:46
37. BONUS - The Wild Hunch (no drums no guitars) 03:18
38. MISC. - Evolution of a Track - Calamari Cavalry pass 1 00:53
39. MISC. - Evolution of a Track - Calamari Cavalry pass 2 01:12
40. MISC. - Evolution of a Track - Calamari Cavalry pass 3 01:12
41. SKETCHBOOK - The Lost and the Damned 00:44
42. SKETCHBOOK - Squids Theme 01:21
43. OFFCUTS - Edge of the Sea, rejected title demo 01:19
44. OFFCUTS - The Bigger Adventure 1 00:29
45. OFFCUTS - The Bigger Adventure 2 01:00
46. OFFCUTS - Squids Theme alternate intro 00:20

(c) Romain Gauthier 2018, All rights reserved.
All music composed, arranged and produced by Romain Gauthier in Tokyo, Paris, Barcelona and other places.
Mastering by Elmobo at Conkrete Studio.
Cover art by Jérôme Reneaume.

data.short_description: Squids Odyssey Original Soundtrack by Romain Gauthier. The complete music collection from Squids Odyssey, with previously unreleased tracks!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 217 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires 217 Mb free space.
